programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve Pat'lantis) S4 (26/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve Pat'lantis»Sid Swashbuckle the Pirate and his first pup mate Arrby steal the giant pearl-making shell that gives Puplantis its magic.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve l'épave d'un bateau / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve une baleine) S5 (3/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve l'épave d'un bateau / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve une baleine»Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby have taken the sunken sloop! A wiggling whale has knocked the diving bell upside down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille des Mers et Sid Laratisse) S5 (9/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille des Mers et Sid Laratisse»The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les Super Chiens jumeaux) S6 (12/26)
programme.desc: «Les Super Chiens jumeaux»Super-bandit, Ladybird, shrieks havoc in Adventure Bay taking all of the town's treasures - including Mayor Goodway! The Mighty Pups team up with new super pals, The Mighty Twins, to save the day - and the Mayor - in this super heroic adventure!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Super Patrouille, Puissance Maximale : l'attaque des trois super méchants) S7 (4/26)
programme.desc: «La Super Patrouille, Puissance Maximale : l'attaque des trois super méchants»Harold, Ladybird, and the Copycat team up and the three super baddies take the Mighty Pups' mighty meteor! The Mighty Pups have to get their meteor back and Charge Up to stop them before the team of baddies destroys Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La pierre de l'espace / Le maire adjoint) S4 (17/26)
programme.desc: «La pierre de l'espace / Le maire adjoint»Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille et le petit loup blanc / L'explorateur égaré) S6 (19/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille et le petit loup blanc / L'explorateur égaré»After an unexpected snowstorm, Everest takes care of a wolf cub when they work together to make sure the Paw Patrol can find them. Touring Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole, where they encounter crocodiles?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (All Paws on Deck) S9 (n°16)
programme.desc: «All Paws on Deck»Ryder calls on every member of the Paw Patrol to stop a hi-tech kid inventor from demolishing Adventure Bay so she can build her own dream city in its place.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Détective Baby Shark) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Détective Baby Shark»Detective Baby Shark: When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le camion pouvellinger / L'armure royale) S7 (21/26)
programme.desc: «Le camion pouvellinger / L'armure royale»Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue! // Gift for the Princess been scattered all over town. It's up to Rocky's Re-Use It Truck to put her gifts back together!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la petite souris) S2 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la petite souris»Paddington & The Tooth Fairy: Judy loses a tooth, quite literally! Will it be found in time for bed, and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? (S2, ep 12a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa accroche une photo) S1 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Papa accroche une photo»Papa Pig promises to put up a picture of Peppa and George when Mama Pig is gone. He accidentally damages the wall, so Peppa and George help Papa Pig fix the wall before Mama Pig gets home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (A la plage) S1 (46/52)
programme.desc: «A la plage»Peppa and her family go to the beach. There they do all kinds of things, such as digging Papa Pig in the sand. When it's time to go home, they almost leave without Papa Big, because he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Madame Patte géante) S1 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Madame Patte géante»George finds a spider in the bathroom sink. Peppa is very scared until she realizes he doesn't want to harm her.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Kite) S1 (7/78)
programme.desc: «The Kite»While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Nap) S1 (8/78)
programme.desc: «The Nap»The Nap: Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep! (S1, ep 8).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La fête des lumières avec Blue) S3 (4/18)
programme.desc: «La fête des lumières avec Blue»Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special guest coming to our party! Who could it be?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest»With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La fête de la grande vallée) S2 (3/26)
programme.desc: «La fête de la grande vallée»Adventure Bay Parade Day goes awry when Alex puts too many balloons on Katie's bathtub float. It literally "floats" away, and with Cali and Chickaletta inside!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace) S2 (14/20)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «De drôles de nuages / La ruée vers la comète de cristal»Candy floss clouds cause confusion in 'Every Cloud', and then in 'Rainbow Comet Rush', can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? (S2, ep 11).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Everest, la petite nouvelle !) S2 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Everest, la petite nouvelle !»The PAW Patrol rolls out in their new PAW Patroller to save Jake when he gets stranded in the ice fields, but a new pup also pops up to lend a paw, the brave ranger, Everest!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La moufette / Le baleineau) S3 (20/26)
programme.desc: «La moufette / Le baleineau»When Everest gets sprayed by a skunk, the pups delicately try to tell her she needs a bath! // The pups put a new spin on freeze tag after they fly far north to help free a baby whale that's trapped under the ice.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Liberty Meets a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest) S9 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Liberty Meets a New Friend / Pups Save the Pup Pup Boogie Contest»Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta. // Francois' hot-air balloon goes out of control before the Pup Pup Boogie Contest. The Pups, with Liberty, race to the rescue.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers : Les Chiens pirates) S4 (19/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers : Les Chiens pirates»Carlos and Tracker get stranded on an island in the search for buried treasure.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mission Paw Mission Secrète : Grosse Frayeur / Il Faut Sauver Monsieur le Maire) S4 (7/26)
programme.desc: «Mission Paw Mission Secrète : Grosse Frayeur / Il Faut Sauver Monsieur le Maire»While on safari with Carlos and Tracker, Mayor Humdinger steals a magic mask.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mission secrète : La couronne) S4 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Mission secrète : La couronne»Chase and the team are called to Barkingburg to keep an eye on the crown.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mission Secrète : Le trône royal) S4 (10/26)
programme.desc: «Mission Secrète : Le trône royal»Sweetie plans Sweetie plans to steal the actual royal throne, so she can rule.to steal the actual royal throne, so she can rule.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (All Paws on Deck) S9 (n°16)
programme.desc: «All Paws on Deck»Ryder calls on every member of the Paw Patrol to stop a hi-tech kid inventor from demolishing Adventure Bay so she can build her own dream city in its place.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête des pirates de Danny) S3 (16/52)
programme.desc: «La fête des pirates de Danny»C'est l'anniversaire de Danny Chien. Avec l'aide de grand-papa Chien et grand-père Cochon, les enfants se lancent à une chasse au trésor des pirates...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La visite de monsieur Patate) S3 (17/52)
programme.desc: «La visite de monsieur Patate»Tous les habitants de la ville sont ravis de rencontrer monsieur Patate qui arrive pour ouvrir un nouveau centre sportif...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Battle) S1 (39/52)
programme.desc: «The Battle»Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Ninja Blaze) S4 (11/20)
programme.desc: «Ninja Blaze»Ninja Master Blackbelt is training Blaze and AJ to be powerful ninjas when Crusher and Pickle accidentally launch themselves onto an icy mountain! Now Blaze and AJ must use their new ninjas skills to rescue them.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Rallye Polaire) S3 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Le Rallye Polaire»Blaze and his friends head to VelocityVille and transform into racecars for the Polar Derby, a wintry race through the snow! But when racecar Crusher knocks them off-course, the pals must keep cool to stay on track.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le sauvetage du mini-panze / L'ascension d'el grande) S7 (18/26)
programme.desc: «Le sauvetage du mini-panze / L'ascension d'el grande»Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La reine cot-cot / La montgolfière du désert) S7 (19/26)
programme.desc: «La reine cot-cot / La montgolfière du désert»We see a strange land where Chickaletta is royalty in 'Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck', then in 'Pups Save a Desert Flounder', Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball) S2
programme.desc: «La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Cirque Cosmique) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Cirque Cosmique»Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve Pat'lantis) S4 (26/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve Pat'lantis»Sid Swashbuckle the Pirate and his first pup mate Arrby steal the giant pearl-making shell that gives Puplantis its magic.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve l'épave d'un bateau / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve une baleine) S5 (3/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve l'épave d'un bateau / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve une baleine»Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby have taken the sunken sloop! A wiggling whale has knocked the diving bell upside down.

programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille des Mers et Sid Laratisse»The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

programme.desc: «Les Super Chiens jumeaux»Super-bandit, Ladybird, shrieks havoc in Adventure Bay taking all of the town's treasures - including Mayor Goodway! The Mighty Pups team up with new super pals, The Mighty Twins, to save the day - and the Mayor - in this super heroic adventure!

programme.desc: «La Super Patrouille, Puissance Maximale : l'attaque des trois super méchants»Harold, Ladybird, and the Copycat team up and the three super baddies take the Mighty Pups' mighty meteor! The Mighty Pups have to get their meteor back and Charge Up to stop them before the team of baddies destroys Adventure Bay!

programme.desc: «La pierre de l'espace / Le maire adjoint»Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave. // Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

Touring Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole, where they encounter crocodiles?

programme.desc: «All Paws on Deck»Ryder calls on every member of the Paw Patrol to stop a hi-tech kid inventor from demolishing Adventure Bay so she can build her own dream city in its place.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Détective Baby Shark) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Détective Baby Shark»Detective Baby Shark: When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le camion pouvellinger / L'armure royale) S7 (21/26)
programme.desc: «Le camion pouvellinger / L'armure royale»Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue! // Gift for the Princess been scattered all over town. It's up to Rocky's Re-Use It Truck to put her gifts back together!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et la petite souris) S2 (12/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et la petite souris»Paddington & The Tooth Fairy: Judy loses a tooth, quite literally! Will it be found in time for bed, and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? (S2, ep 12a).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les bulles) S2 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Les bulles»Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le coucher) S2 (14/52)
programme.desc: «Le coucher»Il est presque l'heure d'aller se coucher. George et Peppa, qui jouaient dehors, doivent rentrer pour prendre un bain. Après s'être brossé les dents, ils se mettent au lit et Papa Pig leur lit une histoire. Papa Pig et Maman Pig s'installent devant la télévision mais ils ont sommeil après cette longue journée...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'embouteillage) S2 (13/52)
programme.desc: «L'embouteillage»Granny et Grandpa Pig ont invité Peppa, George et ses parents à déjeuner mais, sur le trajet, la famille se retrouve bloquée dans un embouteillage. Comme ils ne sont pas arrivés alors que le repas est prêt, Grandpa Pig décide de le leur apporter dans sa brouette...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Cuddle Toy) S1 (11/78)
programme.desc: «The Cuddle Toy»The Cuddle Toy: Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher loses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies! (S1, ep 11).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (12/78)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Bababam / Les barbamartiens) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Bababam / Les barbamartiens»Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians. They have no time to get acquainted when a giant plant attacks the village.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Une journée de sport avec Blue) S3 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Une journée de sport avec Blue»Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le style Guppy) S4 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le style Guppy»The Guppies hit the road to see a concert by Stylee, a singing sensation known for her fabulous styles!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fin de partie) S2 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Fin de partie»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le test de la beauté) S1 (27/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le test de la beauté»Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a Chinese fingertrap and Paddington gets stuck to Mr. Curry while auditioning for a play.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve Pat'lantis) S4 (26/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve Pat'lantis»Sid Swashbuckle the Pirate and his first pup mate Arrby steal the giant pearl-making shell that gives Puplantis its magic.

programme.desc: «La Super Patrouille, Puissance Maximale : l'attaque des trois super méchants»Harold, Ladybird, and the Copycat team up and the three super baddies take the Mighty Pups' mighty meteor! programme.desc: «All Paws on Deck»Ryder calls on every member of the Paw Patrol to stop a hi-tech kid inventor from demolishing Adventure Bay so she can build her own dream city in its place.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en train) S3 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en train»Madame Gazelle emmène Peppa et ses amis pour une balade en train, où elles devront cocher ce qu'elles voient sur leurs feuilles d'activité...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La journée des jeunes talents) S3 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La journée des jeunes talents»C'est la Journée du talent à la garderie de Peppa. Madame Gazelle veut que chacun montre à la classe son talent particulier...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbaprank!) S1 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Barbaprank!»It is pranks day. The Barbababies have fun finding new pranks... until Barbabright spots the track of a dinosaur.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le super lot géant) S4 (6/20)
programme.desc: «Le super lot géant»At the Axle City Fair, Blaze and AJ realize they don't have enough coins to use the new Supersize Prize Machine. So to earn money, Blaze gets three different jobs, transforming into super-cool vehicles to take care of business.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Des bolides lumineux) S3 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Des bolides lumineux»A light thief (Melissa Rauch) is on the loose, leaving all of Axle City in the dark! Gabby outfits Blaze with special lights to help him track down the light thief and restore the missing lights.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace) S2 (14/20)
programme.desc: «Les mini héros / Un visage dans l'espace»When the younger animals in the forest want to be like their heroes Deer Squad, things don't go as planned as Sir Steel steps in. // The Deer Squad have to save the day in Space when Sir Steel's plan to project his face on the moon goes wrong!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le festival des lumières) S2 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Le festival des lumières»Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.
